title: DSS Model Output
description: Version 0.1. The schema describes the DSS model outputs for the IPM Decisions platform. See an example here: TODO

timeStart.description: The timestamp of the first result data. Format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX", e.g. 2020-04-09T18:00:00+02:00
timeStart.title: Time start (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX)

timeEnd.description: The timestamp of the last result data. Format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX", e.g. 2020-04-09T18:00:00+02:00
timeEnd.title: Time end (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX)

interval.description: The sampling frequency in seconds. E.g. 3600 = hourly values
interval.title: Sampling frequency (seconds)

resultParameters.description: The result parameters. They are individual for each model, except for 'WARNING_STATUS', which may have the following values: 0=warning not applicable (e.g. outside of season), 1=missing data, 2=No risk, 3=Possible risk, 4=High risk
resultParameters.title: Weather parameters

locationResult.description: The DSS result data per location.
locationResult.title: DSS Model result data

longitude.description: The longitude of the location. Decimal degrees (WGS84)
longitude.title: Longitude (WGS84)

latitude.description: The latitude of the location. Decimal degrees (WGS84)
latitude.title: Latitude (WGS84)

altitude.description: The altitude of the location. Measured in meters
altitude.title: Altitude (Meters)

data.description: The data. In rows, ordered chronologically. Columns ordered as given in resultParameters.
data.title: Result data per location
